title: Palestinians doubt Gaza ceasefire will last considering Israel’s violations
text:
Palestinians doubt Gaza ceasefire will last considering Israel’s violations

NewsFeed Palestinians doubt Gaza ceasefire will last considering Israel’s violations

Al Jazeera’s Hind Khoudary asks Palestinians whether they think the fragile ceasefire with Israel will hold as they continue to face deadly shelling, shooting, and new destruction in Gaza.
summary: Al Jazeera’s Hind Khoudary asks Palestinians whether they think the fragile ceasefire with Israel will hold in Gaza.
source: Al Jazeera – Breaking News, World News and Video from Al Jazeera
